typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	device_id as string
}
source(output(
		age as boolean,
		customer_id as string,
		detail_watch_time as (end_time as integer, start_time as integer)[],
		device_id as string,
		direction_pitch as double,
		direction_roll as double,
		direction_yaw as double,
		gender as string,
		mask as string,
		max_watch_duration as integer,
		order as string,
		status as string,
		stay_time as integer,
		timestamp as long,
		watch_start_time as long,
		watch_time as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine',
	preferredIntegralType: 'integer') ~> source1
source1 aggregate(groupBy(stay_time),
	stay_time_sum = sum(stay_time),
		watch_time = sum(watch_time)) ~> SumAggregate
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		customer_id as string,
		target_hour as string,
		stay_time_sum as integer,
		generation as integer,
		gender as integer,
		mask as integer,
		watch_time_sum as integer
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		customer_id
	)) ~> sink1
SumAggregate sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		customer_id as string,
		target_hour as string,
		stay_time_sum as integer,
		generation as integer,
		gender as integer,
		mask as integer,
		watch_time_sum as integer
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		stay_time_sum
	)) ~> sink2
